Scripts.OnLoad:
self:SetBackdrop({ bgFile = "Interface\\TutorialFrame\\TutorialFrameBackground", edgeFile = "Interface\\Tooltips\\UI-Tooltip-Border", tile = true, tileSize = 30, edgeSize = 8, insets = { left = 5, right = 5, top = 5, bottom = 5, }, }) self:SetBackdropColor(1, 1, 1, 0)
Altoholic:BindViewToController(self, "AltoholicUI.AchievementButton")
local level = self:GetParent():GetFrameLevel() self:SetFrameLevel(level + 1) self:RegisterForClicks("LeftButtonDown", "RightButtonDown")
Scripts.OnClick:
if button ~= "LeftButton" or not IsShiftKeyDown() or not self.key then return end
local chat = ChatEdit_GetLastActiveWindow() if not chat:IsShown() then return end
local link = DataStore:GetAchievementLink(self.key, self.id) if not link then return end
chat:Insert(link)
